text: The Swan 57 was designed by German Frers and built by Nautor's Swan and first launched in 1996. It was unlike most models not conceived as a cruiser/racer but a world cruising yacht the design features a raised saloon or centre cockpit. ==External links== * Nautor Swan * German Frers Official Website ==References== Category:Sailing yachts Category:Keelboats Category:1990s sailboat type designs Category:Sailboat types built by Nautor Swan Category:Sailboat type designs by Germán Frers
title: Swan 57 Mk II
